1.2.name: wordpress/wordpress-meta-keywords
1.2.description:
This plugin will make it possible to use tags as meta keywords. Under Pages you will find a new meta box called Keywords. By activation the plugin registrates a separate taxonomy which is independent from post tags. Today's search engines don't use meta keywords as a criteria at all, but who knows for what they will be good in future ;) For me tagging is necessary to bring pages in relation and gives me the possibility to save my tags redundant in the database.

Features

  • Use post tags as meta keywords
  • Registrates own taxnomy for pages
  • No coding needed
  • Language support

Related Links

  • Homepage
